title: The Forehand Slice, Once Disdained, Makes a Comeback
description: It was once considered a desperate shot, but experts say it can give players an edge. Coco Gauff and Carlos Alcaraz use it.
dc:creator: Stuart Miller
media:description: Coco Gauff hitting a forehand slice during the French Open in May. Gauff is among the players who use the shot, which can help to gain an edge against powerful opponents.
